con:request.name: Delete Any User From All Users List

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Login").getPropertyValue("Response") def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def Token = holder.accessToken log.info Token context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Auth", "Bearer "+Token) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Auth", "Bearer "+Token)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create Product").getPropertyValue("Response") def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def Productid = holder.product._id log.info Productid context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("pid", "/"+Productid) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("pid", "/"+Productid)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Login").getPropertyValue("Response") def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def Token = holder.accessToken log.info Token context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Auth", "Bearer "+Token) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Auth", "Bearer "+Token)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create Order").getPropertyValue("Response") def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def Orderid = holder.order._id log.info Orderid context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("ide", "/"+Orderid) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("ide", "/"+Orderid)
